actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to amend the Intermodal Surface Transportation Efficiency Act of 1991 to provide for the establishment of Internet, dial-in network, and telephone access to information on traffic conditions as part of the intelligent vehicle-highway systems program, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Intermodal Surface Transportation Efficiency Act of 1991 to direct the Secretary of Transportation, after allocating specified funds to eligible States or local entities for application of intelligent vehicle-highway systems, to allocate a specified amount for FY 1996 for the establishment of an Internet system, a dial-in network system, and a telephone access system to provide information on traffic conditions to metropolitan commuters. Directs the Secretary to enter into a contract for the establishment of a pilot project consisting of each of the above-referenced systems for the Virginia Department of Transportation Traffic Management System.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Intermodal Surface Transportation Efficiency Act of 1991 to provide for the establishment of Internet, dial-in network, and telephone access to information on traffic conditions as part of the intelligent vehicle-highway systems program, and for other purposes.
